testcase.name: Adding a new employee -third way
testcase.system-out: Given The user wants to go to OrangeHRM Website.............................passed When Thee user wants to enter username and password.........................passed Then The user wants to click on Login button................................passed And The user wants to verify that browser landed on "Dashboard".............passed Then The user wants to click on PIM module..................................passed Then The user wants to add employee's first and last name as following list.passed Then The user wants to add login details in a list way......................passed Then The user wants to save the information.................................passed Then The user should be able to see "Personal Details"......................passed
